abstract: InBev stuck to its proposal to take over reluctant bid target Anheuser-Busch and said it would seek to give the latter’s shareholders a direct voice if the U.S. brewer still refused to talk.
lead_paragraph: InBev stuck to its proposal to take over reluctant bid target Anheuser-Busch and said it would seek to give the latter’s shareholders a direct voice if the U.S. brewer still refused to talk.

headline.main: InBev Threatens to Take Fight to Anheuser Shareholders
